attributes.review: This app spreads the fascist agenda of a racist bigot who does not care about America. He is filled full of only hate and narcissism. This man is a Cheeto puff – orange, devoid of substance, leaves an unappealing trace wherever he goes, generally unfulfilling, pretending that there are more like him than there actually are (those bags are NEVER full), and so on. Why anyone would actually use this app makes no sense to me whatsoever.
attributes.title: The Worst App Ever

attributes.review: Where do I begin?? This app is not smart, it’s not kind and it’s not important. It missed the mark and is high key sad if I’m being honest. Like I thought this was a app where I could buy self-tanner but they don’t even have the good stuff. I’m trying to blackfish this summer and this app was a disappointment when it comes to that front. #OrangeLivesMatter
attributes.title: What a mess

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in hopes to stay up-to-date with the wonderful things our President has been doing, however, after the first few nights of the app sitting on my phone, I started feeling sick. I went to the doctors and I was diagnosed with coronavirus. 

This app gave me coronavirus.

Do not download it if you wanna catch a disease the president does not believe in.
attributes.title: GREAT, but...

attributes.review: I got the app because I “love trump” and I had it for a little while but it made my phone start glitching out of nowhere and I kept getting notifications that actually scared me like “Please help, I don’t want to work on this app anymore” and “I actually really want to vote for Bernie Sanders,” I even got a notification that said “If you see this, just settle for Biden.” THIS APP WILL GIVE YOU VIRUSES
attributes.title: Nah

attributes.review: The day I finally got my turtle riding license was such a good day. But then it was ruined. I found out Cheeto man became the president and I was sad. Fast forward 4 years i was so happy scrolling through endless Tik toks just having a party but then I hear freaking Cheeto man wants to take away my happiness. So the app is horrible don’t get it and don’t vote for Cheeto man unless u want ur happiness to be gone
attributes.title: Fart noise

attributes.review:
this is the worst app ever. as soon as i downloaded a wild lion came into my house, stole my tv, and then jumped out my window. another reason why i don’t like this app is because it caused my phone to hardwire, leaving the screen all different colors lines. (i am writing this from my computer btw). why don’t we elect a smart, non-racist president next time? 

❤️😽 sarah
attributes.title: AWFUL APP FOR AN AWFUL PRESIDENT

attributes.review: this app is ✨horrible✨ and has really biased topics. the people who get this have ✨0 to no✨ brain cells if they truly support this 👿evil👿 man and believe these terrible people. Other than every other fact I have states, this entire “app” and it’s very cOrReCt “news” Is nothing but utter garbage. I hop this gets removed, and thats the tea 💅💅😌😌

attributes.review: wish i could give this app and this man a lower rating. i died and came back to write this review. when i downloaded this app it hacked all of my devices with faces of the man himself DONALD DUMP. they wouldn’t let me go until i gave them my baby so that trump could take a picture with it in front of a church then go back to his bunker. i hate this app and hate this man more. tehe.
attributes.title: CANCEL TRUMP

attributes.review: First of all this app made my dog racist and he ran away from home and took all my money and left without a goodbye! Now I have to live on instant ramen and hot cheeto’s. If u want to become homeless fine come and download it but I’m about to be evicted. If your president started the COVID-19 orders earlier and we quarantined I would be able to make money to make a living. Terrible app 1 star 👹
